## Overview

```{r, echo=FALSE}
extract_metadata <- function(file) {
  lines <- readLines(file, warn = FALSE)
  
  # Identify YAML front matter lines
  if (length(lines) > 0 && lines[1] == "---") {
    end_yaml <- which(lines == "---")[-1][1]  # Find the second "---"
    if (!is.na(end_yaml)) {
      yaml_content <- lines[2:(end_yaml - 1)]
      meta <- yaml::yaml.load(paste(yaml_content, collapse = "\n"))
      
      return(data.frame(
        teaching = ifelse(!is.null(meta$teaching), meta$teaching, "Unknown"),  
        exercises = ifelse(!is.null(meta$exercises), meta$exercises, "Unknown"),
        objectives = ifelse(!is.null(meta$objectives), paste(meta$objectives, collapse="\n   - "), list("No objectives listed")),
        questions = ifelse(!is.null(meta$questions), paste(meta$questions, collapse="\n   - "), list("No questions listed")),
        stringsAsFactors = FALSE
      ))
    }
  }
  return(NULL)
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
#| output: asis
# Extract metadata from the current Quarto document
metadata <- extract_metadata(knitr::current_input())

if (!is.null(metadata)) {
  cat("\n\n")  # Ensure Markdown formatting works
  cat("\n- **Teaching:** ", metadata$teaching)
  cat("\n- **Exercises:** ", metadata$exercises)
  cat("\n- **Questions:**")
  for (item in metadata$questions) cat(paste("\n   - ", item, "\n"))
  cat("\n- **Objectives:**")
  for (item in metadata$objectives) cat(paste("\n   - ", item, "\n"))
} else {
  cat("No metadata found in the file.")
}
```
